author: Harry Ervin
comment: Listed as an option for S2. After purchase it became clear that it is not.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content:
Hello Harry. 
Since you are a Gear S2 user you'll have to download individual watchfaces from Samsung Galaxy store. Google Play watchfaces are for Android wear users only. Hope this answers your questions, if you have any other questions or issues please contact us via email and we will be happy to help you out. (ask.watchmaster@gmail.com) 
Thanks.

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: Phone battery doesn't synch; turbo 2 and moto 360; fixed battery issue
title: Dark

author: Mike
comment: Love your watch faces but it would be great to be able change the dials to other things like another time zone or temperature etc.
title: Ability to customise would be great
